name: Endless Labyrinth of Night Roads
description:
Join the slice of life, coming of age story about the wolf travelling across the world of impressionistic landscapes

ELoNR is a short, visual-heavy VN with its current chapter 1 being half an hour long.  Each chapter centres on the relationships between our main lead Jeremie and various folks from his life.  Jeremie is a drifter, a delivery man who can travel the world through the network of portals. From lonely peaks to bustling valleys, he has seen it all, but every wanderer will inevitably wander home

Join the Nocturnal Realm Discord server to be updated on ELoNR and my latest works

Made by Nik Rouz (follow me to see more arts of mine)
With OST by Kalus and ending song of Chapter 1 by Barry
Proofreading by Rudra, Barry & Joshua C. Pipkins
